basics.name: Joshua Asuncion
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

courses: EE 361 Digital Systems and Computer Designs
ECE 406 Intro to Computer and Network Security

work.summary: As a sales associate, I was in charge of customer satisfaction throughout the store, organizing and handling items in the backroom and on the sales floor, and ensuring the safety of all customers and peers.

work.company: The Salvation Army Kroc Center - Hawai'i
work.summary: As a Lifeguard 1, we were in charge of the safety and health of patrons on a day-to-day basis by upholding the Salvation Army mission in the Aquatic department in a professional manner.
highlights: Lifeguarding with CPR/AED for Professional Rescuers and First Aid

work.summary: As a school custodian, I was in charge of keeping the inside and outside of the school campus clean and sanitary on a consistent schedule, as well as specialized deep cleaning projects during summer breaks.
As temporary help, I had to be self-motivated and independently responsible for filing invoices as well as being able to collaborate with a team when needed.

awards.title: National Society of Leadership and Success Certificate Recipient
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii - West Oahu NSLS Chapter
awards.summary: Awarded to individuals who have successfully became members of the National Society of Leadership and Success.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Academic honor awarded to students who meet specific criteria, including a minimum GPA of 3.5 and minimum 12 credit hours.

awards.title: CTE Honors Recognition Certificate
awards.summary: Academic honor awarded to students who excel in their career and technical education program.

awards.title: Academic Honors Recognition Certificate
awards.summary: Academic honor awarded to students who demonstrate outstanding academic achievement.
